text: Va [ononro la'nat kardaem ʙa xotiri in] suxanason, ki: "Mo Maseh – Iso pisari Marjam – pajomʙari Allohro kustem", dar hole ki na uro kustand va na ʙa dor ovextand, vale [amr] ʙar onon mustaʙah sud [va mardero, ki saʙehi Iso ʙud, ʙa dor kasidand] va kasone, ki dar ʙorai u ixtilof kardand, hatman, dar ʙoraas ducori tardidand va hec ilme ʙad-on nadorand, magar on ki az gumon pajravi mekunand va jaqinan, uro nakustand
